# Allow all search engines to crawl the main site
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://daivikcarwash.github.io/daivikcarwash/sitemap.xml

# Block GitHub auto-generated pages and unnecessary files
Disallow: /README.md
Disallow: /docs/
Disallow: /.github/
Disallow: /LICENSE
Disallow: /CONTRIBUTING.md
